item.description:
The CNHT Annual Taxpayer Reunion Family Picnic will be held on JULY 9, 2011 from 12-4PM at the Hillsborough American Legion #59 which is located at 538 West Main Street, Hillsborough, NH 03244

Our EMCEE will be talk show host and State Representative MIKE BALL.

Tables will be available for declared candidates w/cost TBD. 
Tables for local groups are FREE.
Traditionally the first Presidential Straw Poll of the season, and lots of food! 
Price is $15 for all you can eat.
Online ticket ordering to come soon at www.cnht.org

ALL 2012 PRESIDENTIAL and Congressional CANDIDATES: Please contact webmaster@cnht.org for information on tables/ticket prices for staff and info on speaking opportunities.
 
The Hillsborough American Legion #59 Hall is located at 538 West Main Street, Hillsborough, NH 03244  (Air Conditioned)
Directions: From the South - Rte 114N to 149NW, then left onto W. Main - From Rte 202/9SW then exit left to W. Main Street
item.name: CNHT Picnic July 9th
